OOC: This is more clear


Perceptor:

Perceptor set the shields and defences up and replied to Hydras 
while he draged Nightlight towards the cells "Do you rather that the 
prisioner be first Interrogated, MAster??? She could know what 
happened with our first scout-team that went to the Maximal Base... 
Plus you can see the show, 'cause I have special gadget that don't 
let her scape..."
